title: IP address for LAN server?
body:
Is there an IP address for the LAN server that I can perform a trace route test on?

Interestingly enough I live right outside of Miami however receive the same latency on the NA server as the LAN server (60ms).

Are you guys just hosting both in Chicago right now?

replies.body:
I did some digging and found one of the IP's for our servers: 66.151.33.248

I'm taking it that you've already got a VPN you trust, but if not I'd suggest [**CyberGhost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us). That's just the one I prefer but feel free to use any you're used to! Hit us back up if you've got any other questions.
Take your time getting back to me!  This is super low priority I was just curious.
